name: Esha!
greetingText: We really like your name cuz it sounds cooler than Shivani
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what we were going to do (a DM)
text3: But then we stopped and realised
wishText: Cheers to another year of pretending to be an adult!
outroText: Okay, now please tell us if you liked it.
replayText: Or, watch it again you might like it :P
